In una calda estate del 1999, dopo aver letto recensioni entusiastiche e dopo mesi di accantonamento paghetta, decisi di acquistare Half Life. Era appena il mio secondo FPS dopo DOOM, ma questo titolo aveva qualcosa di diverso. L'atmosfera, la storia, la cura dei dettagli, il comparto tecnico, il gameplay. Tutto semplicemente al TOP. Per l'epoca Ã¨ stata una rivoluzione che ha portato il genere ad un livello superiore. Ancora oggi si fa valere alla grande e paragonato a titoli odierni, risulta essere ancora parecchio avanti. In poche parole, Ã¨ un pezzo di storia videoludica!

Review update:
I finished the game (normal mode, I don't think I could handle hard psychologically), and it has to be the worst good game I've ever played.

So many cool ideas and moments overwhelmed by real bad design choices and glitches. Half of my time I was having fun killing enemies, solving puzzles and following the intriguing story told by the environment, the other half I was fighting with my character getting stuck everywhere (Gordon's a fatty apparently) and countless glitches. I guess they made for occasional funny moments but most of the time they were frustrating. At some point I wasn't even able to continue the game because no matter what I did I would get stuck into a pipe (in surface tension) in between loading zones. 

I might recommend at least checking out half life, it's cool in terms of ideas, but I'd never recommend playing this version on steam, especially if you do not like unpolished games. There are updated versions like Half Life Source and the fan remake, Black Mesa. I never touched those, this is my first approach to the series, but they came several years later and are supposed to improve a few things.

I'm honestly excited to dive in HL2 now, as I'm told it has improved so much and is far more polished, which is truly the one thing this game lacks.

Some pros and cons I found

PROS:
-Innovative for the time
-Plenty of good ideas in terms of level design and storytelling
-Fast paced action 
-Many secret areas reward exploration with lots of pickups and new weapons.
-Mostly fair despite some big bs moments (like enemies spawning inside of you)
-Good variety despite the limited assets
-Oddly enough there were more details and interaction options in here than most modern games

CONS:
-Movement is mheh, platforming is super slippery and not fun.
-Audio is not good, you can't hear voices most of the times and the reverb fx is really messed up.
-Some parts or entire levels are pretty bad, especially the final part which everyone seems to agree on
-Too many glitches and inconsistencies, I spent so much time re-doing parts due to glitches, at some point I had to save every few steps to avoid wasting more time.
-A tad too many blind guesses.
-Final boss is a long lame battle, had way more fun with the first "tentacles" boss in the burner room.

Very fun game, it's a shame it didn't end sooner. It's a classic game that should be played by anyone who likes fps. Seriously, it was so worth it that I bought this old game at a sale. It is a game that has aged very well and is still very fun to play nowsday. As a CS parent it shouldn't be hard to please anyone who likes FPS.

100% Worth purchasing during the steam summer sale, i got all the half life games for like 7 bucks. And for the game itself, really good so far and i cant wait to start half life 2.

good game that had great potentional. although it is amazingly designed with a strategy, an element of horror, and the gameplay itself, you can quite often find yourself stuck, not knowing where to go next, or sometimes even softlocked; although getting softlocked is uncommon, it will probably happen 1 or 2 times during your playthrough.

the story however is a bit confusing and i still dont get what exactly happened in some of the scenes. the ending is also very ominous.

a major point of critisism is that sometimes the background noise is too loud to hear any of the dialogue.

if those nitty-gritty things where to be removed, i'd give it a 9/10. but because of the annoyances this game has sometimes, im gonna give it a 7,5/10.

Great experience, definitely recommend: although, be ready to be frustrated sometimes.
